title: We the people이라면
contents: We the people이라면.가까운 시기에 일어날 일의 계획을 현재형으로 올립니다.1. 현재 USA 주식회사는 파산하였고, FED/FRB는 재무부로 귀속되었으며, 군부가 통제하고 있답니다.2.미 대선 부정선거 감사 및 보고가 마리코파 카운티를 선두로 진행 중이며, 482:128로 트럼프 승리로 예상된답니다.3. 카발ㆍ딥스테이트의 하부구조인 바이든, 해리스, 낸시는 이미 체포구속 또는 미래 체포 구속될 것이랍니다.4. 통제중인 군부가 작전이 끝나면, 선거감사가 완료되기 전이라도 트럼프 대통령은 America 19대 대통령으로 복귀할 것이며, 그 시기는 현재 비공개 이며 곧으로만 알려져 있답니다.5. 워싱턴 DC 백악관은 폐쇄되었고, 트럼프 대통령 복귀시 백악관은 텍사스와 플로리다가 될 거로 공개되었습니다.6. 산샤댐 붕괴를 시점으로 카발ㆍ딥스는 몰락할 것이며,주식시장 붕괴, 암호화폐 붕괴, 글로벌 통화리셋이 일어날 것이랍니다.악인의 폭동 및 계엄령, 몇 개월의 고통은 필요할 수 있습니다.7. 양자컴퓨터 시스템에의한 블록체인 암호화폐가 금본위제도를 통해 시행될 것이며, 세계의 많은 나라들이 서명해 놓은 상태랍니다.8. 새로운 양자금융시스템 (QFS)은 스타링크 위성 120 개에 의하여 운용 되며, 그 이전에 10일간의 군사작전이 있답니다.9. 3일은 블랙아웃(주류미디어, SNS통신, 전기)과 QFS셋팅이 있으며, 3일은 카발ㆍ딥스의 범죄내용들이 제작된 900편 동영상으로 8시간 3회씩 걸쳐 EAS로 전 지구적으로 송출될 겁니다. 주류언론과 검열 빅텍의 부패가 청소되며, 프리에너지 시대가 온답니다.10. 오딘 프로젝트 10일이 끝나면, NESARA/GESARA가 시행되며, 이는 새로운 세계가 시작됨을 뜻합니다. 기밀로 분류되었던 특허 및 기술 6,000개가 공개 될 것입니다. 의료기술은 600개이며, COVID-19 감염자는 수 시간내 치료가 가능하며, 암과 AIDS도 치료가능하답니다.[예: 관성 질량 감소 장치 특허 US10144532B2를 사용한 비행체.고주파 중력파 발생기 특허 US10322827B2.삼각형 우주선 특허 US20060145019A1.물질 순간이동 시스템 특허 US20060O7II22A1.우주 중력 에너지 반중력 비행 접시 특허 CN1850542A.AIDS 치료 특허 U55676977.양자 진공 에너지 추출 US7379286B2.해군 UFO 특허, 소형 핵융합로에 대한 특허 출원].11. 애국자가 승리하면, 재건된 대한민국 한반도는 자유통일되어 만주까지 확장되어 있을 겁니다. 북한의 지하교회가 남한의 형제자매를 깨울 것이며, 부국강병과 전 세계 복음증거의 중심역할을 수행합니다.12.위헌파면/대선/총선 부정이 한국도 밝혀지고, 관련자는 처벌될 줄 앎니다. 반중친미, We the people로 국민이 애국으로 뭉치면요.우리는 이것을 국민과 함께하는 연합군 특수작전이라고 부를 수 있습니다.미래 선택은 주님나라를 위한 우리의 헌신과 사랑과 행위에 달려 있습니다.https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6dlPF-kGD7c #StrikeBackForFreedom Seeks Shepherds Who Share These 7 Beliefs As Fundamental to Their Christian Faith1.We believe . . . that the Bible is the verbally inspired Word of God and without mistakes, as originally written. It is the complete revelation of His will for salvation and the only unfailing rule of faith and practice for the Christian life.2.We believe . . . in one God, Creator of all things, eternally existing in three persons: Father, Son, and Holy Spirit, and that these three are co-eternal and of equal dignity and power.3.We believe . . . in the deity of Jesus Christ; His miraculous conception by the Holy Spirit; His virgin birth; His sinless life; His substitutionary death on a cross; His bodily resurrection; His ascension to the right hand of the Father; and His personal, imminent return.4.We believe . . . that man was created by and for God; that by man’s disobeying God, every person incurred spiritual death, which is separation from God, and physical death as a consequence; and that all people are sinners by nature and practice.5.We believe . . . the Lord Jesus Christ died for our sins and that all who believe in Him are declared righteous because of His sacrificial death and are, therefore, in the right relationship with God.6.We believe . . . in the present ministry of the Holy Spirit indwelling all believers and thus enabling and empowering the life and ministry of the believer.7.We believe . . . in the bodily resurrection of everyone who has lived, the everlasting blessedness of those in right relationship with God, and the everlasting punishment of those who have rejected God’s forgiveness in His Son.#StrikeBackForFreedom은 기독교 신앙의 기본으로 이 7가지 믿음을 공유하는 목자를 찾습니다. . . 1.우리는 믿습니다. . .성경은 원래 기록된 대로, 구두로 영감을 받은 하나님의 말씀이며 오류가 없다는 것입니다. 그것은 구원을 위한 그분의 뜻의 완전한 계시이며 그리스도인의 삶을 위한 유일한 확고한 믿음과 실천의 법칙입니다. 2.우리는 믿습니다. . . 한 하나님 안에서 만물의 창조주이시며 성부, 성자, 성령의 세 위격으로 영원히 존재하시며, 이 세 위격은 함께 영원하시며 동등한 존엄성과 권능을 가지신다는 것입니다. 3.우리는 믿습니다. . . 예수 그리스도의 신성 안에서; 성령에 의한 그의 기적적인 잉태; 그의 동정녀 탄생; 그의 죄 없는 삶; 십자가에서 그의 대속적 죽음; 그의 육체적 부활; 아버지의 우편으로 승천; 그리고 그의 개인적인 임박한 재림. 4.우리는 믿습니다. . . 그 사람은 하나님에 의해 그리고 하나님을 위해 창조되었습니다. 사람이 하나님께 불순종함으로써 모든 사람은 하나님과 분리되는 영적 사망과 그 결과 육체적 사망을 초래했습니다. 그리고 모든 사람은 본성과 행위에 의해 죄인이라는 것입니다. 5.우리는 믿습니다. . . 주 예수 그리스도는 우리의 죄를 위해 죽으시고 그분을 믿는 모든 사람은 그분의 희생적인 죽음으로 인해 의롭다고 선언되었으며 따라서 하나님과 올바른 관계에 있게 되었습니다. 6.우리는 믿습니다. . . 모든 신자에게 내주하는 성령의 현재 사역에서 신자의 삶과 사역을 가능하게 하고 능력을 부여합니다. 7.우리는 믿습니다. . . 살아 있는 모든 사람의 육체적 부활, 하나님과 올바른 관계에 있는 사람들의 영원한 축복, 그리고 하나님의 아들 안에서의 용서를 거부한 사람들의 영원한 형벌에 있습니다.

title: which we represented an employer and helped the...
contents: 1. Case summaryWe (attorneys in charge: Ko Il-Kwang, Jung Sang-tae and Kim Kyeong-yeon) represented a local autonomous government, which had workers working twelve-hour rotating day and night shifts.The workers filed a claim for the payment of outstanding allowances for overtime and night work, asserting that counting two hours of breaks towards working hours was wrong because they did not have the two-hour break during night work.2. DecisionOn September 29, 2021, the Youngwol Branch Court under the Chuncheon District Court (the 1st Single Civil Division) precluded the plaintiffs’ argument that they had not been given two-hour breaks for the following reasons: (i) the duties assigned to the plaintiffs are intermittent and sporadic, (ii) the defendant has a space on the 1st and 3rd floors of the incineration building where the workers can take a rest and provides a resting place for workers with sofas installed in an office of the leaching building, (iii) CCTVs that monitor inside and outside the leaching building are installed but it appears that CCTVs are installed to control and monitor the business establishment, (iv) even though the siren sounds once an hour during night work, it appears that the siren is designed to prevent workers from neglecting their duties during night work, (v) despite the plaintiffs’ assertion that they were on standby when facilities were inspected, there is no objective materials showing that the defendant supervised the plaintiffs during the waiting time.3. Our argument and roleWith regard to this case, the Office of Employment and Labor had already determined that the plaintiffs had not been given breaks, and accordingly, the employer had paid money for settlement to the plaintiffs. As such, the circumstances told that it would be difficult for the defendant to win the case. We visited the site to clearly understand and deliver the factual background to the court, and collected evidence that could show that the plaintiffs’ assertions were false. We argued and substantiated through interviews with related persons that there were no personnel supervising the plaintiffs during night work, that CCTVs did not monitor inside the office, that the siren sounded for a very short period of time and that the plaintiffs themselves could procure a two-hour break.4. ImplicationThere is a frequent dispute between employers and workers about breaks, overtime work allowances and the scope of holiday work allowances with regard to the rotating shift work system. The decision will serve as an important precedent in determining certain matters relating to breaks and the scope of allowances for workers engaged in rotating shift work □ Attorneys in charge: Ko Il-Kwang, Jung Sang-tae and Kim Kyeong-yeon  “가장 정직하고, 올바르고, 효율적인 법률 서비스를 제공 합니다”송무/자문에서 최고 실력을 보유한 변호사들의 로펌, 법무법인 바른 바른빌딩서울특별시 강남구 테헤란로92길 7 서울특별시 강남구 테헤란로 92길 7(대치동 945-27번지) 바른빌딩상담전화 02-3476-5599  ▼아래를 클릭하시면 바른 홈페이지로 이동합니다. ▼최신 법률 정보를 담은 바른의 월간 뉴스레터를 무료로 신청하실 수 있습니다.

title: 근저당권말소 법무사 대전 대동 법무사 사무소 위로 THE WE LAW
contents: 안녕하세요. 대전 동구 법무사대전 근저당권말소 법무사법무사 사무소 위로 'THE WE LAW'입니다. 개인간 돈을 빌리거나 금융권 등에서 대출 할 때 담보로 부동산에 근저당권 설정을 하는 경우가 많습니다. 대전 근저당권 말소 대전법무사사무소 위로 은행에서는 장래의 채권을 일정액의 한도에서 미리 담보하는 것이라 이자를 갚지 않을 경우를 감안하여 그부동산에 빌려준 돈의 120%~130%의 채권최고액을 설정하게 됩니다.대전 채권압류 채권추심이 궁금하다면 클릭해보세요. 대전 채권압류 채권추심 - 대전 동구 법무사사무소 THE WE LAW채무자에게 1억원 추심 완료하였습니다. 대전 법률상담은 법무사사무소 위로가 함께합니다. 시험출신의 탄...blog.naver.com 근저당권을 설정하면 돈을 빌린 사람이 채무금을 갚지 않을 때에 경매로 신청하여 후순위 채권보다 먼저 배당 받을 수 있는 우선변제권을 가지게 됩니다.근저당권의 말소는 채무상환을 완료하여 계약이 해지되었거나 당사자간 합의가 이루어졌거나 경매 등으로 목적물이 매각되는 등 근저당권이 소멸될 때 진행하게 됩니다.근저당권 말소등기를 하고자 하실 때 궁금하신 사항은 저희 법무사사무소 위로 'THE WE LAW'에 문의하시고 편하게 방문해주세요.신속하게 상황에 맞는 근저당권 말소 진행을 해드립니다.  시험출신의 탄탄한 실력을 소유한법무사가 직접상담, 직접처리 해드리며 법무사, 회계사, 세무사, 변호사와 연계되어원스톱 서비스를 제공해드립니다. 의뢰인 한분 한분 정성껏 1:1상담으로집중할 수 있는 시스템을 갖춘 법무사사무소 위로복잡하고 어려운 법률문제가 있다면 생활 속 법률부터 어려운 소송까지 법무사가 직접상담 해드리는법무사사무소 위로'THE WE LAW' 가 함께 해드립니다. 대동 충남중학교 앞 1층대전법무사사무소 위로THE WE LAW 042) 282-9001 위 번호로 연락주시면 출장상담 및 상담예약 가능합니다.법무사사무소 위로대전광역시 동구 계족로 124 1층 법무사사무소 위로  THE WE LAW

title: to survive the pandemic. We need a powerful virus radar.
contents: [Washington Post] Flying blind is no way to survive the pandemic. We need a powerful virus radar.The omicron variant of the covid-19 virus emerged around Thanksgiving. The first confirmed case in the United States was recorded Dec. 1, and the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention estimated the prevalence for the week ending Dec. 18 had soared to 73 percent — an astounding and alarming leap, virtually displacing the delta variant. Now, the CDC has revised that week’s estimate down to 22.5 percent, a correction that underscores how the United States is flying blind in the pandemic storm.Undoubtedly, omicron will continue to rise, but the initial, overly high estimate is a symptom of a serious, systemic gap in public health information. We have the technology to chart the whole genome of a viral sample. But the United States has not yet built a real-time system of viral genomic surveillance that would allow comprehensive tracking of variants as they move through the population. As it is now, the CDC pulls together genomic surveillance data from a variety of sources, including its own facilities, state public health labs, and university and private laboratories, but only a fraction of all pandemic samples are sequenced, and it can take weeks to build a reliable picture of how the variant is spreading. The CDC’s weekly prevalence estimates can also include projections from modeling, at least until hard data arrives. The most recent CDC estimate for omicron prevalence during the week ending Dec. 25 was 58.6 percent in the United States.As Rajiv J. Shah, president of the Rockefeller Foundation, warned in a report, “One secret weapon has helped beat every disease outbreak over the last century; but it is not masks or social distancing, lockdowns, or even vaccines. Instead it is data. … Data is what moves us from a panic-driven response to a science-driven one.” The pandemic caught the United States and much of the world flat-footed, without that data, although some countries, such as Britain, have made it a priority.We need to know what variants are spreading where, in order to make critical decisions about in-person learning in schools or to distribute therapies aimed at specific variants, such as monoclonal antibodies. At-home diagnostic rapid tests are a growing plus, but if there is no collecting the data into a real-time surveillance system, the picture is incomplete. A simple smartphone app might help harvest this data; the technology would also have obvious benefits for flu, strep throat and other illnesses.We have the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration and its National Weather Service to warn of tornadoes and other weather dangers. The U.S. Forest Service has the National Avalanche Center to warn skiers and others. The U.S. military maintains early warning radars to spot ballistic missile threats. Now it is time to give viral genomic surveillance the same heft and priority. The Biden administration announced funding this year from the American Rescue Plan to help the CDC and states ramp up such surveillance, and states have been sequencing far more samples than in the past. But we cannot be satisfied until the nation has a radar that provides real-time, precise information about the microbial threats we face.from https://www.washingtonpost.com/opinions/2021/12/30/flying-blind-is-no-way-survive-pandemic-we-need-powerful-virus-radar/

title: All the Light We Cannot See (Doerr, Anthony)
contents: Title: All the Light We Cannot SeeAuthor: Anthony DoerrCountry: United StatesLanguage: EnglishGenre: Historical FictionPublished: May 6, 2014Pages: 531Award: Pulitzer Prize for Fiction, Andrew Carnegie Medal for Excellence in FictionPublisher: ScribnerISBN: 978-1-5011-7321-9 In January, with the anxiety about the approaching invasion of Ukraine by Russia, I read Anthony Doerr’s All the Light We Cannot See which had been on my must-read list for a long time. I knew it's about the Second World War and assumed that it would be a heartbreaking story about life during the war. To come clean, I had actively avoided reading it because I'd already read plenty of heart-rending stories about the war enough to break many hearts. This winter, at last, I mustered up my courage and picked it up from my bookshelf. Unlike my anticipation, All the Light We Cannot See was a rather pleasant surprise, which didn’t break my heart at all, but at the same time, the novel threw some cold water on my expectation to read a great novel in terms of literature. I will condense my impression of the novel into three words: beautiful and shallow. All the Light We Cannot See centers on two characters: a blind French girl named Marie-Laure LeBlanc, and a German boy, Werner Pfennig. As the plot unfolds, the two teenagers’ paths eventually cross like France's and Germany's paths did in 1940. Marie-Laure and Werner find  each other though  the invisible light, which you can work out while reading the book. The story toggles between the bombing of Saint-Malo, France in August 1944 and Marie-Laure's and Werner’s earlier experiences until then since 1934. Marie-Laure is a blind girl living in Paris with her father who is the master locksmith at the Museum National d’Histoire Naturelle. Reportedly, there is a precious diamond called the Sea of Flames hidden in the secret vault in the museum. The diamond is alleged to be cursed: the owner is granted immortality at the cost of unending misfortune to all those he loves. When Germany invades France, the museum makes three replicas of the Sea of Flames. Three of the four diamonds, maybe  including the real one, are sent to various places to keep the Nazis from laying hands on the real Sea of Flames. Marie-Laure’s father is chosen as one of the carriers. She and her father flee to Saint-Malo with one of the four, whose genuineness is unknown. The director said there would be three decoys. Added to the real diamond, that makes four. One would stay behind at the museum. Three others would be sent in three different directions. One south with a young geologist. Another north with the chief of security. And one is here, in a field west of Versailles, inside the tool case of Daniel LeBlanc, principal locksmith for the Muséum National d’Histoire Naturelle.Werner Pfennig is an orphan living in a small coal-mining town in Germany. Since his father was killed in a mining accident, Werner and his sister, Jutta are raised at Children’s House run by a good-natured French woman, Elena. He is full of questions about the world and exceptionally bright. One day he finds a broken radio in a dump and fixes it, whereupon the new world is opening to Werner and Jutta. Traveling through the radio frequencies, he finds different worlds, dreaming about his future: What do we call visible light? We call it color. But the electromagnetic spectrum runs to zero in one direction and infinity in the other, so really, children, mathematically, all of the light is invisible. However, the Nazis’ power is in full swing, and Werner must think about his and Jutta’s saftey and future. Werner’s skill enables him to enter the prestigious Nazi elite school, the National Political Institute of Education. All the Light We Cannot See was such a beautiful and fast-paced book that I couldn’t put it down until the last page. Marie-Laure’s and Werner’s stories were so enthralling that I was always wondering what would happen next. I rooted so much for their survival and happiness because they are too innocent to be lost at war. Also, there are so many beautiful scenes and phrases which are still stuck with me. Especially, the French radio broadcast that Werner stumbles upon one night is such a captivating scene that every single word of the broadcast strikes a chord with me: Open your eyes, and see what you can with them before they close forever. Despite its beautiful story and enchanting phrases, however,  All the Light We Cannot See is without depth. It seems that the novel is targeted at the early teens: as pretty as a picture,  too meek and fable-like. All the violence and cruelty of the war are omitted or happen behind the scenes. Marie-Laure’s father’s suffering in the Nazi concentration camp is shown indirectly through his two short dubious letters and the violent attack on Werner’s friend, Frederick also happens in the background. As if the book couldn't afford to be realistic and authentic, to be rated PG-13. I expected more than this because the novel was awarded renowned literary prizes such as the Pulitzer Prize. I think I must accept that the Pulitzer Prize for Fiction is rather politically oriented than is for literature. The year 2014 marked the 70th anniversary of the Normandy Landings (for your information, the novel won the Pulitzer Prize in 2015). They may have needed a book like All the Light We Cannot See to celebrate the Allies’ victory over the Nazis. It’s interesting that the novel effectively downgrades the Soviet Red Army’s contribution by inserting the Soviet soldiers’ sexual assaults against German women. Of course, I know it was the case, but considering the plot and its target readership(?), it feels a bit pointless. Frederick said we don’t have choices, don’t own our lives, but in the end it was Werner who pretended there were no choices, Werner who watched Frederick dump the pail of water at his feet—I will not—Werner who stood by as the consequences came raining down.

title: 대전 소송전문 법무사 대전 대동 법무사 사무소 위로 THE WE LAW
contents: 안녕하세요. 대전 중구 법무사대전  소송전문 법무사법무사 사무소 위로 'THE WE LAW'입니다. 인생을 살면서 우리는 많은 사람들과 관계를 맺고 살아갑니다.때로 그 관계에서 다양한 이유로 여러 문제가 발생합니다.그리고 혼자서 해결하기 어려운 경우에는 법적인 절차로 그 문제를 해결하고자 합니다. 대전 소송전문 법무사 대동 법무사사무소 위로 법적인 절차의 도움으로 해결하고자 할때 반드시 법률지식이 있는 사람과 함께 진행해야 좋은 결과로 마무리 지을 수 있습니다. 다양한 상황과 여러가지 이유로 인한 문제에 맞는 다양한 법적 절차와 기한이 있기 때문입니다.개인적인 문제를 법적인 절차를 통해 해결하는 걸 원하신다면 혼자보다는 함께 도움을 받아 원하는 방향으로 이끌어 나가시면 좋겠습니다.민사소송, 소장, 답변서, 준비서면 등상담이 필요하시다면 법무사가 직접 상담해드리는 대전법무사사무소 위로'THE WE LAW'로 연락해주시길 바랍니다.대전 지급명령 - 대여금, 공사대금, 물품대금, 매매대금, 보증금 등 변제 받고 싶다면 클릭하세요. 대전 지급명령 법무사 [대여금, 공사대금, 물품대금, 매매대금, 보증금, 약정금 변제받고 싶어요] 법무사사무소 위로 THE WE LAW가 함께합니다.안녕하세요~ 대전 지급명령 법무사 대전 민사소송 법무사 대전 법무사사무소 '위로' THE WE...blog.naver.com  시험출신의 탄탄한 실력을 소유한법무사가 직접상담, 직접처리 해드리며 법무사, 회계사, 세무사, 변호사와 연계되어원스톱 서비스를 제공해드립니다. 의뢰인 한분 한분 정성껏 1:1상담으로집중할 수 있는 시스템을 갖춘 법무사사무소 위로복잡하고 어려운 법률문제가 있다면 생활 속 법률부터 어려운 소송까지 법무사가 직접상담 해드리는법무사사무소 위로'THE WE LAW' 가 함께 해드립니다. 대동 충남중학교 앞 1층대전법무사사무소 위로THE WE LAW 042) 282-9001 위 번호로 연락주시면 출장상담 및 상담예약 가능합니다.법무사사무소 위로대전광역시 동구 계족로 124 1층 법무사사무소 위로  THE WE LAW

title: 대전 이혼소송 법무사  대전 대동 법무사 사무소 위로 THE WE LAW
contents: 안녕하세요. 대전 동구 법무사대전 이혼소송 법무사법무사 사무소 위로 'THE WE LAW'입니다. 대전 이혼소송 법무사  법무사사무소 위로  만약 내가 이혼을 하게 된다면? 삶을 살다보면 여러 가지 문제로 인해 부부가 함께하지 못하고 이혼을 해야하는 경우가 있습니다. 부부가 협의하여 이혼이 진행되지 않아 일방에 의해 재판을 통해 이혼을 하는 경우에 재산분할, 자녀양육권, 위자료청구 등 복잡하고 어려운 이혼절차에 직면하게 됩니다.  대전 이혼소송 법무사 법무사사무소 위로또한 재산을 재산분할과 위자료 등 어떤 명목으로 받는 것이 유리한 것인지도 전문가를 통해 살펴봐야합니다. 이혼 후 자녀 과거양육비청구권이 궁금하다면 클릭해보세요. 이혼 후 자녀 과거양육비청구권 - 대전 중구 법무사사무소 위로'위로씨의 생활법률상식' 이혼 후 자녀를 부양해온 모(母)의 과거양육비청구권에 대해 알아볼까요~ 이혼 후...blog.naver.com  저희 대전법무사사무소 위로에서는 의뢰인분의 이혼조정신청을 어려움 없이 해결해드리고자 심층적 상담을 통해 이혼 및 위자료에 대한 조정신청을 진행하고있습니다. 이혼소송, 재산분할, 위자료, 친권 및 양육권, 양육비  등에 관한 상담이 필요하시다면 대전 법무사사무소 위로 THE WE LAW에서 자세히 상담해드리겠습니다.친절하고 정확한 상담으로 여러분의 든든한 법률 파트너가 되어드리겠습니다.  시험출신의 탄탄한 실력을 소유한법무사가 직접상담, 직접처리 해드리며 법무사, 회계사, 세무사, 변호사와 연계되어원스톱 서비스를 제공해드립니다. 의뢰인 한분 한분 정성껏 1:1상담으로집중할 수 있는 시스템을 갖춘 법무사사무소 위로복잡하고 어려운 법률문제가 있다면 생활 속 법률부터 어려운 소송까지 법무사가 직접상담 해드리는법무사사무소 위로'THE WE LAW' 가 함께 해드립니다. 대동 충남중학교 앞 1층대전법무사사무소 위로THE WE LAW 042) 282-9001 위 번호로 연락주시면 출장상담 및 상담예약 가능합니다.법무사사무소 위로대전광역시 동구 계족로 124 1층 법무사사무소 위로  THE WE LAW

title: 공주등기소 출장 대전 대동 법무사 사무소 위로 THE WE LAW
contents: 안녕하세요. 대전 법무사대전 동구 법무사법무사 사무소 위로 'THE WE LAW'입니다. 어제는 등기를 하기 위해 공주시로 출장을 다녀왔습니다.상속등기, 증여등기, 매미이전등기를 위해서 멀리는 서울, 수원, 포항부터 가까운 곳은 옥천과 금산으로 자주 출장을 다닙니다. 대전법무사사무소 위로 대전지방법원 공주지원 전경 부동산 등기는 소재지 관할 등기소에서 처리하기 때문에  전국 등기소로 출장을 다녀야 한답니다.어제는 업무 처리를 위해 공주 시청에 들러 취득세 신고, 납부를 하고 대전지방법원 공주지원 등기계에 들러 접수하고 업무를 마무리했습니다. 대전 법무사 사무소 위로 대전지방법원 공주지원 모습대전지방법원 공주지원의 모습입니다.요즘 날씨가  좋아 구름 한점 없이 깨끗한 하늘이 보여 좋았습니다. 맑은 하늘을 보니 마음까지 정화됩니다.대전 상속 분쟁 해결이 궁금하다면 클릭해보세요.  대전법무사 상속분쟁 상속포기 한정승인 그 해결은 법무사사무소 위로에 있습니다. 대전동구법무사대전법무사 상속분쟁 상속포기 한정승인 그해결은 법무사사무소 위로와 함께 안녕하세요^^ 어려운 법률문제...blog.naver.com 대전법무사사무소 위로 대전지방법원 공주지원 모습상속등기, 증여등기, 매매이전등기 등 부동산 등기를 하실 분은 어느 지역이든 상관없이 편리하게 저희 법무사사무소 위로 'THE WE LAW'로 연락주세요.신속하고 정확한 업무처리로 여러분의 든든한 법률파트너가 되겠습니다.  시험출신의 탄탄한 실력을 소유한법무사가 직접상담, 직접처리 해드리며 법무사, 회계사, 세무사, 변호사와 연계되어원스톱 서비스를 제공해드립니다. 의뢰인 한분 한분 정성껏 1:1상담으로집중할 수 있는 시스템을 갖춘 법무사사무소 위로복잡하고 어려운 법률문제가 있다면 생활 속 법률부터 어려운 소송까지 법무사가 직접상담 해드리는법무사사무소 위로'THE WE LAW' 가 함께 해드립니다. 대동 충남중학교 앞 1층대전법무사사무소 위로THE WE LAW 042) 282-9001 위 번호로 연락주시면 출장상담 및 상담예약 가능합니다.법무사사무소 위로대전광역시 동구 계족로 124 1층 법무사사무소 위로  THE WE LAW

title: [Fair Trade] We obtained a... is the same as dismissing...
contents: 1. Case summaryThe defendant is a company with business objectives of manufacturing and selling car parts. The plaintiffs are subcontractors who executed a contract with the defendant.The plaintiffs filed a lawsuit for damages of about KRW3.6 billion, alleging that they suffered damage due to the defendant’s acts of violating (i) the ban on reduction of contract payments, (ii) the ban on determining an unfair contract payment and (iii) the obligation to pay fees for note discount and note payment and the defendant was liable for three folds of the damaged amount under the Subcontracting Act.2. The court’s decision: Recommendation of a compromise, in which the defendant should pay KRW245 million to the plaintiffsThe court made the decision of recommendation of conciliation, ordering the defendant to pay KRW245 million, which is far less than the amount the defendant admitted it was liable for the plaintiffs. The decision was finally entered as the parties did not make any objection.3. Our supportWe actively expressed the opinion that the plaintiffs had failed to sufficiently substantiate the alleged damage amount (specifically, the portion exceeding the amount found by the Korean Fair Trade Commission as violation of the Subcontracting Act). (In particular, we pointed out that the plaintiffs did not properly prove the normal price in the case of the ban on determining an unfair contract payment.) The defendant was subject to the order to correct and pay surcharges by the Korean Fair Trade Commission for the violation of the Subcontracting Act. We aggressively argued that penalty (i.e., the KFTC’s action against the violation of the Subcontracting Act) could not be compatible with the concept of punitive damages imposed in lieu of penalty. Consequently, we helped the defendant obtain the favorable decision of recommendation of conciliation.□ Attorney in charge: Baek Kwang-hyun, Shin Dong-min and Kim Ji-su  “가장 정직하고, 올바르고, 효율적인 법률 서비스를 제공 합니다”송무/자문에서 최고 실력을 보유한 변호사들의 로펌, 법무법인 바른 바른빌딩서울특별시 강남구 테헤란로92길 7 서울특별시 강남구 테헤란로 92길 7(대치동 945-27번지) 바른빌딩상담전화 02-3476-5599  ▼아래를 클릭하시면 바른 홈페이지로 이동합니다. ▼최신 법률 정보를 담은 바른의 월간 뉴스레터를 무료로 신청하실 수 있습니다.

title: [Nullification of Election] We convinced the court to...
contents: 1. Case summary1) Who did Barun Law represent?We (specifically, attorneys Jung Young-hun, Shim min-seon, and Cho Yoon-ji) represented the Korean Bar Association (“Defendant 1”) in the lawsuit filed by a former president of the Korean Bar Association (“Plaintiff”) against Defendant 1 and the current president there of (“Defendant 2”).2) Factual backgroundDefendant 2 was elected to be the 41st president of Defendant 1 in the election held on February 21, 2021 (the “Election”). Plaintiff was the second most voted candidate. Plaintiff filed a suit primarily against Defendant 1 to confirm that the decision of the Election Commission of the Korean Bar Association, which had Defendant 2 as the elected president, is invalid, and preliminarily against Defendant 1 and Defendant 2 to confirm that Defendant 2 does not have the status of executive (i.e., president) of the Korean Bar Association.2. Our argument and roleIn relation to the primary cause of claims, Plaintiff asserted that Defendant 2 had violated regulations regarding the election of executives of the Korean Bar Association (the “Regulations”) in the Election. In response to the Plaintiff’s assertions, we explained that Defendant 2 had not violated the Regulations, and even if certain statements allegedly made by Defendant 2 in the past had been likely to constitute a violation of the Regulations, since they were not “seriously illegal” enough to have a “material effect” on the Election and the result thereof, the primary cause of claims made by Plaintiff had no merits in all respects.In relation to the preliminary cause of claims, Plaintiff asserted that Article 32.4 of the rules of the Korean Bar Association provided, “A person who is subject to disciplinary action pursuant to these rules within the recent five years may not become an executive”, Defendant 2 was subject to disciplinary action taken by the Election Management Commission pursuant to Article 5-2.7 of the Regulations on March 10, 2020, the 5-year period did not lapse, and therefore, Defendant 2 was not qualified for an executive (president) of the Korean Bar Association pursuant to Article 32.4 of the rules of the Korean Bar Association. We argued that disciplinary action provided in Article 32.4 of the rules of the Korean Bar Association did not include disciplinary action taken by the Election Management Commission. If it was assumed that disciplinary action taken under the Regulations was included in disciplinary action provided in Article 32.4 of the rules of the Korean Bar Association, the status of Defendant 2 would not be necessarily denied. Therefore, the preliminary cause of claims made by Plaintiff had no merits.3. DecisionAfter a two-year long hearing, the Seoul Central District Court (the 20th Civil Division) accepted our arguments and rebuttals and dismissed both the primary and the preliminary causes of claims made by Plaintiff against Defendant 1. (The claims made by Plaintiff against Defendant 2 were rejected.)4. Related articleshttps://www.etnews.com/20220123000018https://www.lawtimes.co.kr/Legal-News/Legal-News-View?serial=176449□ Attorney in charge: Jung Young-hun, Shim min-seon, and Cho Yoon-ji  “가장 정직하고, 올바르고, 효율적인 법률 서비스를 제공 합니다”송무/자문에서 최고 실력을 보유한 변호사들의 로펌, 법무법인 바른 바른빌딩서울특별시 강남구 테헤란로92길 7 서울특별시 강남구 테헤란로 92길 7(대치동 945-27번지) 바른빌딩상담전화 02-3476-5599  ▼아래를 클릭하시면 바른 홈페이지로 이동합니다. ▼최신 법률 정보를 담은 바른의 월간 뉴스레터를 무료로 신청하실 수 있습니다.

title: [Civil] We reversed the district court’s decision and...
contents: 1. Case summaryWe (attorneys in charge: Park Je-hyeong, Baek Chang-won and Kim Soo-yeon) represented Defendant 2. Defendant 2 was a manager of a collective building. Defendant 1 was the predecessor of Defendant 2. The plaintiff was a person entering into a communication service contract for the collective building with Defendant 1.The manager of the collective building was changed to Defendant 2 from Defendant 1. Defendant 1 handed over his duties to Defendant 2 without giving notice of terminating the service contract to the plaintiff. The plaintiff filed for the primary claim and the preliminary claim for damage cause by the service contract against Defendant 1 and Defendant 2, respectively.The district court considered that the service contract was taken over by Defendant 2 on the basis of the document specifying the transfer of duties between Defendant 1 and Defendant 2 (the “Transfer Document”). As a result, the court determined that Defendant 2 was liable for damages caused by the termination of the service contract.2. IssuesThe main issue at the appeal was whether the service contract was transferred between the predecessor and the successor in light of the interpretation of the Transfer Document and practices in the building management industry.3. DecisionThe Civil Division No. 8-3 of the Seoul Central District Court deemed that there was no agreement on the transfer of the service contract between the defendants, and cancelled the district court’s decision. The court found that Defendant 1, which was a party to the service contract, was liable for damages suffered by the plaintiff due to the termination of the contract.4. Our argument and roleWe aggressively presented legal arguments such as Supreme Court precedents to the effect that implicit agreements on the transfer of contract should be recognized very strictly, and in light of the interpretation of the text of the document executed between the defendants regarding the transfer of duties and the practices in the building management industry, we emphasized that there had been no agreement made with regard to the transfer of contract. Specifically, we analyzed factual information on the basis of content certified letters sent and received during the execution of the Transfer Document. We also submitted certain documents that are generally used in taking over a contract in the building management industry to the court as evidence. As a result, we could reverse the district court’s decision and obtained the decision in favor of our client at the appeal court. □ Attorney in charge: Park Je-hyeong, Baek Chang-won and Kim Soo-yeon  “가장 정직하고, 올바르고, 효율적인 법률 서비스를 제공 합니다”송무/자문에서 최고 실력을 보유한 변호사들의 로펌, 법무법인 바른 바른빌딩서울특별시 강남구 테헤란로92길 7 서울특별시 강남구 테헤란로 92길 7(대치동 945-27번지) 바른빌딩상담전화 02-3476-5599  ▼아래를 클릭하시면 바른 홈페이지로 이동합니다. ▼최신 법률 정보를 담은 바른의 월간 뉴스레터를 무료로 신청하실 수 있습니다.

title: [Criminal] We obtained the decision of innocence...
contents: 1. Case summaryIn or around May 2018, two local securities companies were engaged in an underwriting service for certain bonds guaranteed by CERCG, and issuing and selling ABCP of KRW164.5 billion backed on the CERCG guaranteed bonds. Afterwards, the CERCG guaranteed bonds were dishonored. Accordingly, ABCP failed to be redeemed, and was eventually dishonored.Investigators investigated the case more than one year. In December 2019, the prosecution accused the securities companies and their employees of hiding important information that the CERCG guaranteed bonds were required to be registered with the Chinese foreign exchange control authority (the “SAFE Issue”) and defrauding the other securities companies of KRW160 billion, and of committing an act of receiving money in name of advance fee by using documents that omitted material information or indications or using other statements or indications, in the process of issuing ABCP, in violation of the Specific Economic Crime Act and the Capital Markets Act.We represented one of the accused securities companies and its employees.2. Our role and the court’s judgmentThe above criminal case was prosecuted in December 2019. It went through 13 preparatory and trial hearings until the decision was delivered in February 2022. In the process, there was a fierce dispute while a number of related persons and financial experts were examined as witnesses.Prosecutors argued that the securities companies had not informed of the SAFE Issue during the process of issuing ABCP and that the SAFE Issue had constituted material commercial information. We defended that the SAFE Issue was not material information, and thus, the alleged failure of informing of the SAFE Issue could not be an act of fraud. We further argued that if the alleged failure had constituted an act of fraud as alleged by the prosecutors, it had not been intended. In addition, damage allegedly suffered by the other securities companies had been caused by cross default caused by CERCG failing to honor the guaranteed bonds, and had nothing to do with the alleged failure to inform of the SAFE Issue. Thus, no causal relationship could be found between the alleged fraudulent act and the damage allegedly suffered by the other securities companies. As such, we clarified that the SAFE Issue was not relevant to the default of ABCP on the basis of related materials and testimonies of expert witnesses, emphasizing that the allegations made by the prosecutors were unreasonable.The Seoul Central District Court accepted our argument and delivered the decision of innocence in favor of the securities companies and their employees, determining that it seemed that the securities companies had given explanations to the other securities companies to their fullest knowledge when they had asked them of the SAFE Issue, and it did not see that the defendants had intentionally hidden or had intentionally given wrong explanations of the SAFE Issue. The court further ruled that it was obvious for the counterparties not to purchase ABCP if they had known of the SAFE Issue under general commercial norms, and it could not be found that the employees of the securities companies had a legal obligation to inform them of the SAFE Issue. The court also found that the employees of the securities companies had not used documents that had omitted material information or indications or other statements or indications.3. ImplicationThe securities companies that purchased ABCP filed a civil claim for damages against the defendants on the basis of logic similar to that of the prosecutors, alleging that they suffered damage from the purchase of ABCP. We also represented the same client in the civil claim, and obtained a decision that the court dismissed the claims filed by the plaintiffs in October 2021.In the decisions of the criminal and civil lawsuits above, the courts reviewed various legal matters such as the scope of liability held by ABCP arrangers, the meaning of credit assessment of financial instruments conducted by a credit rating agency and the legal nature of assessment, the scope of criminal liability held by a financial investment business selling financial instruments and the scope of financial investment service provider’s obligation to give an explanation in relation to fraud caused by omissions. We consider that the courts have reached a reasonable conclusion on the foregoing matters.The above civil suit was appealed by the plaintiffs, and an appeal trial is ongoing. It is expected that the appeal trial will proceed in relation to the criminal case if the prosecution appeals in the future. We will do our best to maintain the judgment of the first instance in the appeals of the above civil and criminal cases. In addition to this case, we are also in charge of large-scale financial litigation related to capital markets. We plan to continue to draw leading precedents like this one.□ Attorney in charge: Chung In-jin, Shin Hyun-jeong, Kim Do-hyung and Seol Jae-sun  “가장 정직하고, 올바르고, 효율적인 법률 서비스를 제공 합니다”송무/자문에서 최고 실력을 보유한 변호사들의 로펌, 법무법인 바른 바른빌딩서울특별시 강남구 테헤란로92길 7 서울특별시 강남구 테헤란로 92길 7(대치동 945-27번지) 바른빌딩상담전화 02-3476-5599  ▼아래를 클릭하시면 바른 홈페이지로 이동합니다. ▼최신 법률 정보를 담은 바른의 월간 뉴스레터를 무료로 신청하실 수 있습니다.

title: 소송 법무사 답변서, 소장, 준비서면 동구 법무사 위로 THE WE LAW
contents: 안녕하세요. 대전 법무사대전 폭력죄 소송 법무사소장, 답변서, 준비서면대전 동구 대동199-6충남중학교 앞 1층법무사 사무소 위로 'THE WE LAW'입니다폭행죄 란?폭행죄란 사람의 신체에 대하여 폭행을 가하는 죄이다. < 형법 제260조 1항>다툼은 언제 어디서든 일어날 수 있습니다. 그러다 감정이 격해지면 급기야 주먹까지 오고 가는 상황이 되기도 합니다.이렇게 폭행사건이 발생하게 되는데 폭행은 형사 사건입니다.폭행사건이 일어났다면 폭행죄에 대해 법률전문가의 상담을 통해 신속히 사실관계를 확실히 입증하여 억울한 불이익이 발생하지 않도록 사건을 해결해 다시 일상으로 복귀해야 합니다.  특수폭행 이란? 특수폭행이란 단체 또는 다중(多衆)의 위력을 보이거나, 위험한 물건을 휴대하고 사람의 신체에 대하여 폭행을 가함으로써 성립하는 죄. <형법 261조> 여기서 위험한 물건은 흉기만이 아닌 일상에서 쓰이는 물건을 던진 경우에도 특수폭행 혐의가 적용될 수  있습니다. 특수폭행 혐의가 적용된다면 무거운 처벌을 받기 때문에 자신의 행위를 넘어선 혐의가 적용되는 일이 없도록 대응을 해야합니다.대전 손해배상청구소송이 궁금하다면 클릭해보세요. 대전 손해배상청구소송은 소송전문 대전법무사 대전법무사사무소 위로와 함께 해결해보세요안녕하세요 대전법률상담 대전법무사사무소 위로 THE WE LAW 입니다. 일방적 폭행으로 인해 신체적...blog.naver.com 폭행사건에 법률전문가의 필요성피해자, 피의자 어느 쪽도 법률 전문가의 도움이 필요합니다. 정확한 법률지식으로 피해와 행위에 대해 확실하고 유리한 입장을 전달하고 신속하게 대응하여 더 효과적인 해결책을 찾아볼 수 있기 때문입니다.당사자는 감정적으로 격해져 자신에게 불리한 진술을 하게 되고 입증을 제대로 하지 못하게 되는 등  여러가지로 손해를 입게 됩니다. 저희 법무사 사무소 '위로'는 시험출신의 탄탄한 실력을 소유한 법무사가 직접상담, 직접처리 해드리며 법무사, 회계사, 세무사, 변호사와 연계되어 원스톱 서비스를 제공해드립니다. 의뢰인 한분 한분 정성껏 1:1상담으로 집중할 수 있는 시스템을 갖춘 법무사사무소 '위로'복잡하고 어려운 법률문제가 있다면 생활 속 법률부터 어려운 소송까지 법무사가 직접상담 해드리는 법무사사무소 위로'THE WE LAW' 가 함께 해드립니다. 친절하고 정확한 상담으로 여러분의 든든한 법률파트너가 되어 드리겠습니다.대전 법무사 사무소 위로대동 충남중학교 앞 1층대전법무사사무소 위로THE WE LAW 042) 282-9001 위 번호로 연락주시면 출장상담 및 상담예약 가능합니다법무사사무소 위로대전광역시 동구 계족로 124 1층 법무사사무소 위로  THE WE LAW

title: [Industrial Safety and Health] We obtained the decision...
contents: 1. Case summaryAttorneys Choi Jin-suk, Choi Ju-young, Park Sung-keun, Jung Sang-tae, Park Jun-kyu and Kim Su-yeon represented a construction company building a commercial residence building and its site manager and safety manager.The construction company leased four construction lifts from a lift rental company (“Company A”). Company A executed a contract with Company B regarding the installation and dismantlement of the lifts. While workers of Company B dismantled the lifts, a serious industrial accident occurred as one of the lifts collapsed and three workers were dead and one worker got a serious injury.A prosecutor accused the construction company and its site manager of the crime of violating the Industrial Safety and Health Act and occupational negligence resulting in death and injury.2. IssuesAccording to Article 29 of the then effective Industrial Safety and Health Act, the construction company is responsible for taking safety and health measures only when the contract executed between the construction company and Company A constitutes a contract for certain construction work. Thus, the main issue was whether the contract executed between two companies constituted a contract for construction work or a lease. In addition, in relation to the allegation of occupational negligence resulting in death and injury, whether the site manager and the safety manager were required to use due care or were likely to foresee the occurrence of the accident was an issue in this case.3. Our argument and roleExplaining the differences between a lease and a contract for construction work under the Civil Law in detail, we specifically argued and substantiated the following matters: (i) installation and dismantlement of a construction lift is not construction work conducted in relation to the building itself; (ii) installing and dismantling lifts is work inevitably incidental to a lift lease and cannot be severed from the lift lease to constitute a contract for construction work; (iii) installation and dismantlement of a lift is established in the industry as a duty to be conducted by the lessor of the lift under the lift lease; (iv) the then effective Industrial Safety and Heal Act clearly distinguishes a construction contract from lease of equipment for construction and does not impose any obligation to take a safety and health measures on the lessee of construction lifts in relation to the installation and dismantlement of lifts; and (v) construction companies do not have expertise in installing and dismantling lifts. We also analyzed cases presented by the prosecutor to sustain the prosecution and refuted the prosecutor’s assertion, arguing that the cases could not be applied to this case because construction lifts had different functions from tower cranes and the contract execution method and regulations governing construction lifts were also different from tower cranes. We successfully substantiated that the contract between the construction company and Company A constituted a lease. The court found that the construction company was not guilty of violating the Industrial Safety and Health Act, which was prosecuted on the premise that installation and dismantlement constituted a construction contract. Further, we argued that the construction company and the site manager did not have a right to direct and supervise work to dismantle the lift, and thus, the duty of due care itself did not exist. They could not foresee the accident because they did not have expertise in dismantling lifts and the accident was caused by the inappropriate method of work. Finally, we were able to obtain a judgement of acquittal for the alleged crime of occupational negligence resulting in death and injury.□ Attorney in charge: Kim Jin-suk, Choi Joo-young, Park Sung-keun, Jung Sang-tae, Park Jun-kyu and Kim Su-yeon  “가장 정직하고, 올바르고, 효율적인 법률 서비스를 제공 합니다”송무/자문에서 최고 실력을 보유한 변호사들의 로펌, 법무법인 바른 바른빌딩서울특별시 강남구 테헤란로92길 7 서울특별시 강남구 테헤란로 92길 7(대치동 945-27번지) 바른빌딩상담전화 02-3476-5599  ▼아래를 클릭하시면 바른 홈페이지로 이동합니다. ▼최신 법률 정보를 담은 바른의 월간 뉴스레터를 무료로 신청하실 수 있습니다.

title: [Criminal/Real Estate] We represented the case...
contents: 1. Case summary① Who did Barun Law represent?We represented the Yeokbuk Residence Association formed to conduct a project to build a communal residential complex consisting of 912 units in land sized 56,754㎡ at 89-13, Yeokbuk-dong, Cheoin-gu, Yongin-si.② Case backgroundThe accuser in this case is a local residence association (the “Association”) formed to conduct a project to build a communal residential complex at 89-13, Yeokbuk-dong, Cheoin-gu, Yongin-si (the “Project”). The Association entered into a project management contract with a certain service provider (the “Project Manager”) to conduct that Project. The Association also executed an agreement for the purchase of the project site and the conduct of the Project with an owner thereof (the “Project Owner”).The former president of the Association and the executives of the Project Manager and the Project Owner were related by blood and academic ties. The Project Manager and the Project Owner were specially related companies, and even the CEO of the two entities was the same.The Project Owner discretionally purchased land other than that subject to the sale and purchase agreement for the project site with the Association’s funds in violation of the agreement and used the land independently without incorporating it into the site for the Association’s business. In addition, the Project Owner was required to purchase the project site according to the contract and to complete the registration of transfer of ownership to the Association, but after receiving the down payment and interim payment from the Association, it discretionally set up a mortgage on the project site.The Association filed a complaint against its former president and the executives of the Project Manager and the Project Owner for fraud and breach of trust. However, only unnecessary allegations were repeated as the complaint was filed for matters with regard to which the accused could be found innocent. The Association changed its counsel, but the situation did not change. Only time passed without the investigation being properly conducted.In the end, the Association re-appointed us as its legal counsel for this case. We rearranged the case and focused on issues with regard to which the accused were likely to be found guilty. We gave impetus to the investigation, submitting documents containing our opinion on the issues to the prosecution. When the charges were found guilty, the Project Manager and the Project Owner requested the Association to make a settlement, and the settlement was made amicably.2. ResultAn amicable final agreement was reached between the Association, and the Project Manager and the Project Owner, and the investigation was closed.3. Our argument and roleWe explained to the Association that the opinions filed by the former counsel for it were relating to issues of which the accused would be free from suspicion. Then, we rearranged the case and submitted our opinion regarding issues with regard to which the accused were likely to be found guilty to the prosecution. We further filed petitions prepared by all the members of the Association and a TV report with the prosecution, aggressively expressing our opinion regarding damage suffered by the members of the Association and the illegality of acts committed by the accused. As a result, the prosecution's investigation was resumed in earnest. When the guilt was admitted on the issues presented by us, the Project Manager and the Project Owner requested the Association to make a settlement. The accused agreed to return the project site to the Association, and the settlement was made amicably.Bringing back the case that was going to be closed with the suspect being clear of allegations due to the former counsel’s failure to properly understand the issues, which was caused by the nature of the case involved with the large-scale project, the division of land and the complicated legal relationship, we revealed that the suspect were found guilty and drew a settlement under terms very favorable to the Association.※ A related news article: “The Prosecution Bring Back Non-Homeowners’ Dream of Owning a House.” (https://n.news.naver.com/article/003/0010813411)□ Attorney in charge: Attorneys Kim Jin-suk, Park Sung-keun and Kim Hyeon-seong  “가장 정직하고, 올바르고, 효율적인 법률 서비스를 제공 합니다”송무/자문에서 최고 실력을 보유한 변호사들의 로펌, 법무법인 바른 바른빌딩서울특별시 강남구 테헤란로92길 7 서울특별시 강남구 테헤란로 92길 7(대치동 945-27번지) 바른빌딩상담전화 02-3476-5599  ▼아래를 클릭하시면 바른 홈페이지로 이동합니다. ▼최신 법률 정보를 담은 바른의 월간 뉴스레터를 무료로 신청하실 수 있습니다.

title: [Civil] We won the lawsuit filed by a Hong Kong based...
contents: 1. Case summaryCompany A is a company based in Hong Kong and engaging in distribution and sale of beauty products. Company A entered into a logistics contract with a local company in April, 2017. Company A delegated Company B to export products to China, manage logistics warehouses and deliver products in China on its behalf.Afterwards, Company B informed Company A several times after signing the logistics contract that, in the course of logistics and transportation, cosmetics were seized by Chinese customs. As Company B was in full charge of business in China, Company A had no way of verifying the authenticity of Company B’s claims. Afterwards, during the transaction process, problems such as illegal increase in logistics costs and receipt of illegal money were discovered, and Company A terminated the logistics contract with Company B.In July 2020, Company A filed a lawsuit against Company B. Company A asserted that it had delegated all tasks relating to transportation and delivery of products to Company B. Company B was obligated to manage products to ensure that there was no loss in the products caused by fire, theft, destruction and deficiency in quantity, in the process of transportation and delivery of the products; otherwise, Company B was liable for damage for Company A. In the lawsuit, Company A demanded Company B to pay about KRW1.5 billion consisting of transportation cost and prices for the products paid by Company A to Company in relation to the products allegedly seized by the Chinese customs as well as the outstanding loss of foreign exchange.We represented Company A (the plaintiff) in the lawsuit.2. Our role and the court’s decisionThe lawsuit was filed in July 2020. Before the decision was rendered in January 2022, there were seven hearing sessions. The parties to the lawsuit made their cases by filing the submissions of financial transaction data and the delivery of evidentiary documents to support their arguments.During the proceeding, we confirmed the facts that the documents that allegedly executed by the Chinese customs were fabricated and that the notary deed with which Company B provided Company A in relation to the seizure of the products by the Chinese customers had been destroyed. We filed charges against the related persons of Company B for the falsification of private documents and exercise thereof (in relation to the fabrication of official documents allegedly executed by the Chinses customers), and the loss and destruction of documents (in relation to the destruction of the notary deed). While the civil lawsuit was pending, we obtained the decision that the police would send the case to the prosecution and Company B was found guilty for the destruction of documents.In January 2022, the civil court, which confirmed the police’s decision and Company B’s guilt for the destruction of documents, accepted all the claims made by Company A on the ground that there was no basis for the court to find Company B’s allegation that the products had been seized by the Chinese customs.3. ImplicationThe above lawsuit is a representative case that shows that the results of a criminal case have a very large impact on the related civil lawsuits. We clearly highlighted the illegal acts of the other party through the prompt and accurate progress of the relevant criminal case while we proceeded with the civil lawsuit, and the court rendered a judgment without unfairness in favor of Company A based on the confirmed facts.Currently, the above lawsuit has been appealed by Company B and the appeal is in progress. In addition to the above litigation, we are in charge of litigation involving foreign companies and large-scale financial litigation at home and abroad. We plan to continue to draw leading precedents such as the one above.□ Attorney in charge: Kang Tae-hun, Seol Jae-sun, Bae Si-woong and Sung Su-in  “가장 정직하고, 올바르고, 효율적인 법률 서비스를 제공 합니다”송무/자문에서 최고 실력을 보유한 변호사들의 로펌, 법무법인 바른 바른빌딩서울특별시 강남구 테헤란로92길 7 서울특별시 강남구 테헤란로 92길 7(대치동 945-27번지) 바른빌딩상담전화 02-3476-5599  ▼아래를 클릭하시면 바른 홈페이지로 이동합니다. ▼최신 법률 정보를 담은 바른의 월간 뉴스레터를 무료로 신청하실 수 있습니다.

title: [Intellectual Property] We effectively defended the...
contents: 1. Case summary1) Who did Barun Law represent?Attorneys Kim Jae-ho, Jung Young-hun and Yoo Yeon represented Defendant B.2) Factual backgroundPlaintiff A is a person who holds the patent applied on July 3, 2012 and registered on February 26, 2014 (the “Patent”). Defendant B is a person who provides users with authentication service for credit card payment by using its own server.Plaintiff A filed for patent infringement injunction against Defendant B, asserting that Defendant B infringed the Patent (literal infringement and infringement under the doctrine of equivalents).2. IssuesThe issues in this case were regarding the interpretation of the description of the patent claims and whether the payment proxy request terminal (seller’s terminal), which is one of the components of the patented invention in this case, can be regarded as the same as the purchaser's PC in which the payment program was installed.3.  Our argument and roleIn considering the infringement of a patent, the interpretation of the scope of claims and the scope of the patent should be first dealt with. Representing the defendant we argued, “The plaintiff has confused the illegal limited interpretation of patent claims and the interpretation of patent claims, which is made by taking account of the explanation of an invention or drawings, and consequently, has accused the defendant of infringement of the Patent on the basis of the wrong interpretation of patent claims. Thus, the plaintiff’s claim for infringement has no merits.4. DecisionThe Patent Court (the 4th Civil Division) accepted our argument and determined that the plaintiff alleged the infringement of the Patent by the defendant on the basis of the interpretation of wrong patent claims. The court dismissed all the claims made by the plaintiff (Patent Court 2021Na1374).□ Attorney in charge: Kim Jae-ho, Jung Young-hun and Yoo Yeon  “가장 정직하고, 올바르고, 효율적인 법률 서비스를 제공 합니다”송무/자문에서 최고 실력을 보유한 변호사들의 로펌, 법무법인 바른 바른빌딩서울특별시 강남구 테헤란로92길 7 서울특별시 강남구 테헤란로 92길 7(대치동 945-27번지) 바른빌딩상담전화 02-3476-5599  ▼아래를 클릭하시면 바른 홈페이지로 이동합니다. ▼최신 법률 정보를 담은 바른의 월간 뉴스레터를 무료로 신청하실 수 있습니다.

title: [Advisory] We advised on the sale of 5.54% of shares in...
contents: 1. Case summaryAttorney Choi Jae-woong completed the advisory service for the transfer of 5.54% of shares in Seoul Express Bus Terminal Co., Ltd. (“Seoul Express Bus Terminal”) held by JoongAng Express Co., Ltd. (“JoongAng”) to Shinsegae Central City (“SCC”) for about KRW53 billion.As the largest bus terminal in Korea with 42 bus routes nationwide, Seoul Express Bus Terminal selected SSC as a preferential negotiation partner. In February 2021, 2.94% of shares in Seoul Express Bus Terminal was first transferred to SSC. Then, in January 2022, the rest of 2.61% of shares were finally transferred to SSC. As a result, SSC could increase its holding in Seoul Express Bus Terminal from 64.95% to 70.50%. It has become to more broadly exercise control over Seoul Express Bus Terminal and may exclusively make a special resolution at a general meeting of shareholders. Meanwhile, JoongAng expects that it secures financial liquidity with KRW53 billion earned by selling 5.54 shares in Seoul Express Bus Terminal. It has gained a foothold to overcome crises caused by the Covid-19 pandemic.In relation to M&A deals that require fairness of the procedure as in this case, we provide clients with full legal services for the bidding process, selection of preferential negotiation partners, contract negotiation, preparation of legal documents such as stock purchase agreements, reporting and licensing, disclosure-related tasks and other post-closing legal advice.□ Attorney in charge: Choi Jae-woong and Kim Mi-rae  “가장 정직하고, 올바르고, 효율적인 법률 서비스를 제공 합니다”송무/자문에서 최고 실력을 보유한 변호사들의 로펌, 법무법인 바른 바른빌딩서울특별시 강남구 테헤란로92길 7 서울특별시 강남구 테헤란로 92길 7(대치동 945-27번지) 바른빌딩상담전화 02-3476-5599  ▼아래를 클릭하시면 바른 홈페이지로 이동합니다. ▼최신 법률 정보를 담은 바른의 월간 뉴스레터를 무료로 신청하실 수 있습니다.

title: [Fair Trade] A case in which we helped the client...
contents: 1. Case summaryㅇ A company engages in distribution of certain products, which have a dominant market share in Korea (the “client”). The client is supplied the products by a foreign company through its master distributor.ㅇ The master distributor demanded the client to comply with a certain sales policy, supplying the products to the client. The client refused to follow the policy, saying that the policy was not uniformly applied to all distributors.ㅇ The master distributor changed supply conditions unfavorably to the client. The client determined that the foreign entity (i.e., the Korean branch office) engaged in the change in transaction conditions and the foreign entity’s engagement was unfair. We were retained by the client in dealing with the unfair trade practices.2. Summary of the mediationㅇ The parties made an agreement under which the client would recover the transaction terms previously applicable to it and would diversify customers on the premise that the practices conducted by the master distributor and the foreign entity against the client would constitute an act of sustaining the resale price and abusing its dominant power over the client. The Korea Fair Trade Mediation Agency made a mediation decision, in which it accepted the agreement as it was.3. Our role and implicationㅇ Unfair trade practices among distributors in the linear hierarchy structure have been conventionally committed without awareness of problems with the practices. Distributors would circulate their policy by word of mouth, and it is difficult to prove that distributors force vendors to follow their policy.ㅇ In addition, as retailers have a status lower than distributors, they cannot easily raise issues against them. If they raise an issue, they could not properly deal with legal proceedings that require much time in a rapidly changing distribution market.ㅇ We specifically clarified that the distributor had interfered with the retailer’s operation activities on the basis of diverse evidence such as emails and text messages exchanged between them. We were eventually able to make a settlement to the effect that the client would recover the existing transaction terms.ㅇ This case is meaningful in that the client recovered its contractual rights and received compensation in an expeditious way through settlement and mediation in regards to the dispute over unfair trade practices between distributors.□ Attorneys in charge: Jeong Yang-hoon and Kim Dong-hyun   “가장 정직하고, 올바르고, 효율적인 법률 서비스를 제공 합니다”송무/자문에서 최고 실력을 보유한 변호사들의 로펌, 법무법인 바른 바른빌딩서울특별시 강남구 테헤란로92길 7 서울특별시 강남구 테헤란로 92길 7(대치동 945-27번지) 바른빌딩상담전화 02-3476-5599  ▼아래를 클릭하시면 바른 홈페이지로 이동합니다. ▼최신 법률 정보를 담은 바른의 월간 뉴스레터를 무료로 신청하실 수 있습니다.

title: [Civil] A case in which we... caused by the illegal act...
contents: 1. Case summary① Case background: A plaintiff is a medical foundation operating a general hospital, and a defendant is a securities company carrying on investment sale and brokerage business. In or around 2008, an employee of the plaintiff (“Mr. A”) traded shares in the name of the plaintiff upon recommendation of an employee of the defendant (“Mr. B”) from August 2009 to March 2017. The plaintiff suffered a large investment loss due to the stock trading above. The total amount of loss was KRW10,768,583,000. The losses from stock transactions, brokerage fees and taxes such as securities transaction tax and special tax for rural development were KRW2,622,377,000, KRW6,214,442,000 and KRW1,931,764,000, respectively.② Main issues: The main issue in this case was whether Mr. B’s act of continuously and repeatedly trading stock from the account held by the plaintiff for several years and inflicting damage to the plaintiff would constitute a practice of unreasonable excessive trading in breach of fiduciary duty towards the plaintiff.③ We represented the plaintiff who had lost the case in the district court before the appeal court. (Attorneys in charge: Choo Kyo-jin, Ahn Ju-hyun and Choi Seo-hyun)2. The appeal court’s decisionThe appeal court determined that it cancelled the district court’s decision in which the district court had not accepted the plaintiff’s assertion of the unreasonable excessive transaction practice, and found that the plaintiff was liable for damages caused by its illegal act of the unreasonable excessive transaction practice to the extent of 50% of the amount of damage suffered by the plaintiff due to the defedant’s practice.(i) The court found that Mr. B practically controlled the plaintiff’s account, given that Mr. A started engaging in stock transactions through Mr. B’s recommendation to make up for losses from investment in funds through stock investment, but Mr. A did not directly sell and buy shares for himself and traded shares only through Mr. B even though Mr. A had used HTS from 2013 (which enabled Mr. B to acquire offline brokerage fees higher than those that he could have received from online stock trading), that Mr. A had sent text messages to Mr. B to request him to sell or purchase certain shares and to make profits through short-term trading, but Mr. B had not followed Mr. A’s instructions and had sold the shares three or four days after he had received Mr. A’s instructions to immediately sell them, and that even when Mr. A had not given Mr. B any trading instruction, Mr. B engaged in trading at his own discretion by using the plaintiff’s account. (ii) The court further found that it was difficult for the court to see that the stock trading practice at issue in this case was a reasonable choice for a professional and the practice constituted unreasonable excessive trading in breach of fiduciary duty toward the plaintiff, given that the monthly average turnover ratio (= trading amount/monthly average deposit x 100) was as high as 1,426% in the range between 813% and 9,415%, about 70% of shares consisting of the plaintiff’s portfolio were subject to short-term trading of three days or shorter, the loss caused by the payment of brokerage fees was as much as KRW6,214,442,000, which accounted for 57% of the total loss of KRW10,768,583,000 suffered by the plaintiff, Mr. B had a duty to recommend appropriate investment methods to the plaintiff because he was aware that as a non-profit medical entity, the plaintiff was not intended to aggressively pursue to make profits and the plaintiff had to dispose of a certain amount of shares in the end of every month because proceeds from stock investments needed to be used as operating fund, but even though the plaintiff had continuously suffered from losses, Mr. B maintained the short-term trading practice that could help him and the defendant to earn profits instead of recommending the plaintiff or Mr. A to stop investment or to use other investment strategies.3. Our argument and roleBy considering that relevant materials were generally held by the securities company, we tried to secure new evidentiary materials by requesting the court to order the other party to produce documents relating to the case. We also supplemented the argument about the unreasonable excessive trading practice committed by the defendant, which had been denied by the district court, through conducting research and reviewing factual background. In addition, we made assertions of the defendant’s violation of the Capital Markets Act (specifically, violation of a duty to explain and unfair recommendation) and Mr. B’s discretional trading. Eventually, we were able to win the lawsuit for the plaintiff. In particular, with regard to Mr. B’s control over the plaintiff’s account, we emphasized the background of the case and the unreasonable trade practice that had been continued for several years. We further emphasized the facts that Mr. A’s involvement in trading had been limited, and Mr. B had not followed the client’s instructions. With regard to the excessive nature of Mr. B’s trading practice, we analyzed the monthly average trading ratio on the basis of materials that we procured through the document production order as well as local legal precedents, similar cases in foreign countries, including the US, and the trading ratios reported on KOSPI. By doing so, we were able to help the client win the lawsuit.4. ImplicationThis case affirms that the excessive trading practice conducted by a securities company in terms of the number of transactions for the purpose of making profits from brokerage fees not for the purpose of enabling customers to make profits constitutes an illegal act, and customers can obtain remedy through litigation. In addition, this case is meaningful in that it can serve as a reference case regarding the scope of fiduciary duty and the practical examples of circumstances that constitute elements required for certain trading practices to be recognized as an excessive trading practice.□ Attorneys in charge: Choo Kyo-jin, Ahn Ju-hyun and Choi Seo-hyun  “가장 정직하고, 올바르고, 효율적인 법률 서비스를 제공 합니다”송무/자문에서 최고 실력을 보유한 변호사들의 로펌, 법무법인 바른 바른빌딩서울특별시 강남구 테헤란로92길 7 서울특별시 강남구 테헤란로 92길 7(대치동 945-27번지) 바른빌딩상담전화 02-3476-5599  ▼아래를 클릭하시면 바른 홈페이지로 이동합니다. ▼최신 법률 정보를 담은 바른의 월간 뉴스레터를 무료로 신청하실 수 있습니다.

title: We successfully provided advisory service for the...
contents: 1. Who did Barun Law represent?We represented the employee stock association of Woori Financial Holdings (the “Woori Employee Stock Association”).2. Services and our rolePartner Choi Jae-woong and associates Cho Seo-jin and Kim Mi-rae successfully completed advisory service for the Woori Employee Stock Association on the acquisition of shares in Woori Financial Holdings in relation to a bid for 10% of shares therein (for about KRW900 billion) launched by Korea Deposit Insurance Corporation, which was the existing largest shareholder of Woori Financial Holdings, pursuant to the roadmap for privatization of Woori Financial Holdings.Woori Financial Holdings was the first financial holding company in Korea established in April 2001 with approximately 12.8 trillion won of public funds invested after the 1997 Asian financial crisis. Korea Deposit Insurance Corporation held 100% of shares in Woori Financial Holdings. Korea Deposit Insurance Corporation has sold its shares several times over the past 10 years to recover public funds. In June, 2019, it developed a privatization roadmap to sell all the remaining shares in Worri Financial Holdings by 2022. According to the roadmap, Korea Deposit Insurance Corporation announced the sale of up to 10% (72,806,055 shares) of 15.25% (110,159,443 shares) of shares held by it in Woori Financial Holdings through a competitive bid for the quantities of shares that the bidders desired to buy.Initially, the Public Fund Management Committee also considered a plan to switch to a block sale if bids were low. However, when the bidding process started, letters of intent were received from 18 investors, including financial companies, private equity funds, and overseas investors. The total of their desired acquisition volume was calculated to be 4.8 to 6.3 times the volume to be sold. Among them, a total of 7 investors including Hoban Construction, Harim, Korea Investment Holdings, Eugene PE, and the Woori Employee Stock Association, which were selected as those eligible for participating in the main bidding, submitted bids for 1.73 times of the maximum sale volume. We provided advisory service for the Woori Employee Stock Association, reviewing and analyzing the invitation to bid, the due diligence report, the background of the transaction and the selection standards of a winner, and preparing and submitting a letter of intent and a bid proposal for the client. We represented the entire process before and after the purchase of the shares, from the receipt of the letter of intent to the final bidding, the execution of a loan contract for financing, and a stock transfer contract, and a procedure to make a report with the financial authorities after the closing of the deal in accordance with relevant laws and regulations, and made it possible for the Woori Employee Stock Association to successfully acquire the entire shares put up for the bid (i.e., 7,280,605 shares accounting for 1% of the total issued shares in Woori Financial Holdings).In particular, this case requires legal review of restrictions under applicable laws such as restriction to acquire shares under the Financial Holding Company Act in addition to general advice on the purchase of shares as it involves with shares in a bank holding company and the change of the largest shareholder. Furthermore, the Woori Employee Stock Association is a non-profit organization established under the Framework Act on Labor Welfare and that is subject to the said act. The Woori Employee Stock Association had a distinctive feature that clearly distinguished it from other investors who participated in the bidding process because it was established in the company that issued the shares subject to the bidding. There were lots of procedural restrictions with regard to financing and the acquisition of shares. In addition, there were few similar cases. Thus, the client needed to receive advice on discussion and negotiation with the leading manager as well as review of applicable laws and regulations based on professional knowledge and experience. We reviewed matters and restrictions that could be an issue under applicable laws from the stage of submitting a letter of intent to the process of purchasing the shares in a preemptive manner, and developed an overall action plan and measures that needed to be taken. On the basis of the plan, we identified diverse legal and practical risk factors, reviewing submissions, terms and a draft share transfer agreement. At the same time, we actively communicated with the lenders and the underwriter, cooperating with them in submitting documents and answers to inquiries. We were able to successfully assist the client to acquire all the shares that the Woori Employee Stock Association had wished to acquire. As such, we successfully conducted advisory service regarding the purchase of shares for the client participating in a large-scale competitive bidding, of which value amounted to about KRW1 trillion, on the basis of abundant experience and expertise that we have accumulated as a large law firm in Korea.□ Attorney in charge:  Choi Jae-woong Cho Seo-jin and Kim Mi-rae  “가장 정직하고, 올바르고, 효율적인 법률 서비스를 제공 합니다”송무/자문에서 최고 실력을 보유한 변호사들의 로펌, 법무법인 바른 바른빌딩서울특별시 강남구 테헤란로92길 7 서울특별시 강남구 테헤란로 92길 7(대치동 945-27번지) 바른빌딩상담전화 02-3476-5599  ▼아래를 클릭하시면 바른 홈페이지로 이동합니다. ▼최신 법률 정보를 담은 바른의 월간 뉴스레터를 무료로 신청하실 수 있습니다.

title: 제주 - THE WE호텔 슈페리어룸 / 아가와 함께 여행
contents: 제주 THE WE호텔 제주여행 3일차숙소를 옮겨 위호텔로 왔습니다     저희는 슈페리어 온돌룸으로 예약했어요더블 + 싱글 침대가 있지요   수납공간이 꽤 컷던 옷장저희는 2단유모차를 준비해서 갖고 갔는데유모차가 접어서 들어가도 괜찮을 만큼여유있는 옷장이었어요        가운과 실내화 그리고 금고와 세탁서비스, 구두천 등이 준비되어 있는데여기는 에프킬라와 홈키파? 도 준비되어 있더라구요 ㅎㅎ전 사실 홈키파가 준비되어 있는 호텔은 첨이었는데예비물품치곤 나쁘지 않았어요    옷장 맞은편으로 화장실이 있는데슈페리어룸은 욕조가 없어요저희집은 원래 욕조없는 화장실이기에밖에 나오면 입욕제를 풀고 욕조를 즐기곤 하는데요건 체크하지 못했던 상황이라 당황스럽고 조금 아쉬웠죠 ㅜㅜ       괜찮은 어미니티 이 곳은 일회용칫솔도 제공됩니다(면도기는 역시 없어요 준비하셔야해요)   셀프티와 포트 그리고 찻잔에 티스푼까지깔끔하게 세팅 되어 있지요프링글스, 토블론 초콜릿 등 여러가지가 준비되어 있지만유료라서 손대지 않았어요 ^^     위호텔은 삼다수 생수 두병만 무료 !   냉장고에도 음료가 준비되어 있지만역시나 유로라 손대지 않았어요     위호텔에 모든 시스템은 바로 요걸로 다 해결되어요룸 온도 부터 조명 등등 모두 다 해결됩니다 :)   바닥이 카펫이 아닌 온돌룸임에도 이 곳은 바닥 온도조절이 안됩니다 저렇게 조절 되는 버튼이 달려있어서열-심히 조절했는데 안되서 프론트에 전화하니 안된다고하더라구요이 부분은 완전 체크 Miss 저희는 이걸 체크한다는 걸 당연히 된다 생각하고아이들 옷을 너무 얇은 것만 챙겨갔어요 ㅜㅜ근데 이 날 체크인 해서 들어갔는데에어컨이 빵빵하게 틀어져 있었는데하나도 덥지 않은 날씨에 산이라 그런지 엄청 춥더라고요 ㅜㅜ       소파도 요렇게 준비되어 있는데 요걸 이어붙이면성인이 누울 수 있는 침대형소파가 되더라구요 ㅎㅎ요 뿐만 아니라 체어도 하나 준비되어 있는데사진에 담지를 못했네요 ㅜㅜ   저희 객실은 3층이었는데저녁시간 객실 복도에 피아노소리가 울려서소리를 따라가보니 2층카페에서 연주하시는 소리가 올라온것이었어요 이럴 줄 알았으면 커피를 여기서 마시는거였는데숙소 들어오면서 밖에서 사갖고 들어와서그 점이 넘 아쉬웠죠 ㅜㅜ  THE WE 호텔 수영장    위호텔 하면 수영장이 엄-청 유명하죠 !1층에 위치한 수영장은 투숙하는 동안 계속이용이 가능해요 탈의실, 샤워실 모두 너무 잘되어 있어서객실에서 부터 입고가지 않으셔도 무관해요 !샴푸,린스,바디워시 그리고 수건제공해주셔서수건은 궂이 준비하지 않으셔도 되어요다만 그 곳에서 반납하고 오셔야 하는 것은 체크해두시구요 :)      아침임에도 많은 분들이 이용하고 계서서다 담진 못했지만 (저 뒷모습은 저희남편과 아들이에요ㅎ)실내수영장은 키즈풀, 그리고 성인풀이 나뉘어져 있어요 물론 큰 풀에서 아이들도 같이 이용 가능합니다수영장온도 따뜻해요 큰 풀은32도?키즈풀은 33도 정도 되어서 넘 좋아요수영모자 필수공기주입기 있음   야외에는 자쿠지 그리고 저 멀리 보이는 테이블 옆에 보이시는큰 풀이 있어요 자쿠지는 온도가 36도로 엄-청 따뜻해요큰 풀은 차가운 물이에요자쿠지에서는 튜브이용 불가능합니다      저희가 갔던 날 사실 이런 안개가 껴있어서숙소 들어가는 동안 구간마다 선도 안보이는 곳도 있고앞이 안보여 엄-청 긴장했거든요 ㅜㅜ 그래서 산책로는 커녕 제대로 누리지를 못한 아쉬움이 커요  날씨랑 방안온도만 체크만 잘 하고 갔으면더더 만족스러운 호텔이었을 것 같아요 :)*직접 예약해서 이용한 솔직한 후기입니다저의 개인적인 의견이니 참고정도만 해주세요 :)

title: [Civil] We won the case in its entirety in relation to...
contents: 1. Case summaryIn or about May 2018, two local securities companies arranged to issue and sell asset-backed corporate papers worth KRW164.5B (the “ABCP”) with corporate bonds guaranteed by the CERCG in China as underlying assets. With the CERCG going bankrupt, the corporate bonds failed to be redeemed. Accordingly, the ABCP became insolvent due to non-payment.Some of securities companies that had purchased the ABCP (the “plaintiffs”) filed a lawsuit against the two local securities companies (the “defendants”) for unjust enrichment of about KRW110B, claiming that (i) the defendants had not informed the plaintiffs of the registration requirement with the Chinese foreign currency control office with regard to the corporate bonds of the CERCG during the issuance of the ABCP (the “SAFE issue”), and (ii) the defendants had made a false representation even though the CERCG was not a Chinese local public corporation.We represented one of the plaintiffs in this case.2. Our role and the court’s decisionThere were 12 hearing sessions from November 2018 when the lawsuit was filed to October 2021 when the decision was rendered. During the entire proceeding, the parties engaged in fierce argument with many related parties and financial experts making testimonies.The plaintiffs claimed that the defendant had failed to inform them of the SAFE issue and had made a false representation that the CERCG is a Chinese local public corporation. Against the plaintiffs’ assertions, we clarified on the basis of legal theory that the ABCP was not subject to requirements under the Capital Markets Act, which apply to public securities, because it was securities of private placement. We also substantiated that the SAFE issue was not relevant to the insolvency of the ABCP through diverse related materials and confirmations from experts. We refuted the unfairness of the plaintiffs’ claims by emphasizing that whether the CERCG is a local public corporation in China was the result of evaluation based on the unique work of professional credit rating agencies.The Seoul Southern District Court accepted our case, and dismissed the claims made by the plaintiffs on October 15, 2021, determining that (i) it is difficult to see that the ABCP has objective structural defects that are serious enough for it to be impossible to act as securitization finance; (ii) the credit rating companies granted the credit rating by fully reviewing the redemption capability of the CERCG, including the SAFE issue in assessing the credit rating of the ABCP, and (iv) it cannot find that the plaintiffs violated the obligation to protect investors by intentionally concealing the SAFE issue or making a false indication.3. ImplicationWith regard to the decision above, we consider that diverse legal reviews have been made in relation to the scope of responsibilities taken by the underwriters of the ABCP issued through private placement, the meaning of credit assessment of financial instruments conducted by credit rating companies and the legal nature of the assessment, and the court has reached a reasonable conclusion. The plaintiffs filed an appeal, which is currently pending. We will do our best to maintain the district court’s decision at the appeal court. We also deal with large-scale financial lawsuits relating to the capital market. We plan to continue to draw leading precedents like this case.□ Attorneys in charge: Chung In-jin, Shin Hyun-jeong, Kim Do-hyung and Seol Jae-sun  “가장 정직하고, 올바르고, 효율적인 법률 서비스를 제공 합니다”송무/자문에서 최고 실력을 보유한 변호사들의 로펌, 법무법인 바른 바른빌딩서울특별시 강남구 테헤란로92길 7 서울특별시 강남구 테헤란로 92길 7(대치동 945-27번지) 바른빌딩상담전화 02-3476-5599  ▼아래를 클릭하시면 바른 홈페이지로 이동합니다. ▼최신 법률 정보를 담은 바른의 월간 뉴스레터를 무료로 신청하실 수 있습니다.

title: We helped a client, who filed for an appeal to the...
contents: 1. Who did Barun Law represent?□ We represented a wife sued for divorce and property division from her husband having an affair with another woman2. Litigation and our role□ A district court accepted the husband’s claim for divorce and property division, stating that the husband had had an affair with another woman but the husband’s act was “not unfaithful” even though it was “inappropriate.” The wife filed an appeal and we represented the wife in the appeal. We proved that the husband was liable for divorce by using a parody and additional evidence to show the husband’s act of “dating” was clearly an act of infidelity beyond the appropriate level, and helped the client obtain a decision that the lower district court’s decision be cancelled and the husband’s claim for divorce and property division be dismissed.3. Implications□ In the midst of a growing acceptance of claims filed by a spouse at fault for divorce, the Korean Supreme Court of Korea declared on September 15, 2015 that a spouse at fault for divorce cannot file a claim for divorce. Since then, the district and the appeal level courts have maintained the position where a spouse at fault for divorce cannot file a claim for divorce. Despite this recent trend, the district court dealing with this case found that the relationship between the cheating husband and the incestuous woman was “inappropriate”, but “not an act of infidelity”, allowing the husband to get away with what he had done against his wife. Representing the wife in the appeal, we made our case by using the details of the husband’s relationship with the adulterous woman admitted by the district court and a parody in which the husband and the adulterous woman were replaced with the wife and a man having an affair with the wife. We made our case in a way of asking whether the court would make the same judgement that the alleged relationship was “inappropriate but not an act of infidelity” as the district court regarding the wife’s relationship with the adulterous man when the gender of a spouse having an affair with another was female, not male. We also collected and produced additional evidence showing that the husband was at fault. Eventually, we convinced the court to reverse the district court’s decision, and dismiss the husband’s claim for divorce and property division. Even though a claim for divorce filed by a spouse at fault is accepted, this case reaffirms the long-standing theory that the claim for divorce filed by a spouse at fault is hardly accepted.□ Attorney in charge: Song Bong-jun   “가장 정직하고, 올바르고, 효율적인 법률 서비스를 제공 합니다”송무/자문에서 최고 실력을 보유한 변호사들의 로펌, 법무법인 바른 바른빌딩서울특별시 강남구 테헤란로92길 7 서울특별시 강남구 테헤란로 92길 7(대치동 945-27번지) 바른빌딩상담전화 02-3476-5599  ▼아래를 클릭하시면 바른 홈페이지로 이동합니다. ▼최신 법률 정보를 담은 바른의 월간 뉴스레터를 무료로 신청하실 수 있습니다.

title: 이방인 詩篇 The way we were
contents: 이방인 詩篇The way we were장성호서초 고속도로변 오솔길밤의 적막 속에서한 여인이 바브라 스트라이샌드의 노래 'The way we were' 들으며 지난 추억에 잠겨 있다불빛이 막 스며든 어느 날 밤두 사람이 운명처럼 만난다한 남자가 넓은 가슴과 푸른 손끝으로 그녀의 차거운 몸을 감싸준다그녀도 은은한 빛을 비추며 그를 포근하게 맞아준다숲속 친구들의 부러운 시선 속에서 두 사람이 말과 살을 섞으며 같이 살아가는 법을 배운다불빛이 막 사라진 어느 날 밤그녀가 긴 시름에 빠진다어둠을 밝힐 빛이 없다면 존재의 의미가 없다고 열변을 토한다그는 자연의 순리에 따라 살아가는 존재가 사람이라고 말하며 그녀를 달랜다두 사람이 서로 그리워하면서도 고통스런 평행선을 달리고 있다그녀가 힘이 빠진 목소리로 말한다 다시 시작할 수 있을까요아 그만 잊기로 해요추억은 아름다운 것이지요바브라 스트라이샌드 닮은 가로등의 불이 꺼져 숲속이 밤의 적막이다 로버트 레드포드 닮은 메타세쿼이어도 보이지 않는다

title: 독해공부 The English We Speak - Salty
contents: 오늘 설명할 내용은 5월 25일에 업데이트 된 salty라는 단어입니다. salty를 사전에서 찾아보면 "짭짤한, (때로 약간 저속하기도 하지만) 재미있는" 정도로만 나오고 예문도 잘 나오지 않습니다. 많이 사용하는 단어는 아니라는 말이죠.The English We Speak 코너가 인터미디엇(중급) 레벨용인데, 한 표현을 3분 동안 소개하는 내용이다 보니 우리가 알만한 표현은 거의 나오지 않습니다. 그래서 이 표현을 한번에 이해 못했다고 해서 전혀 실망할 필요 없구요. 표현은 그냥 검색해서 이해해도 됩니다. 주제어 자체 보다는 이 표현을 설명하는 3분 남짓의 내용을 이해하는 것이 중요합니다. 그리고 이 해설(?) 포스팅은 홈페이지를 기준으로 하겠습니다. 유튜브 선호하시는 분들은 재생목록을 보관함에 추가해 놓고 시청하면 됩니다. 아래 홈페이지를 방문하면 전체 스크립트를 볼 수 있고, mp3 파일도 다운 받을 수 있습니다. BBC Learning English - The English We Speak / SaltyWhat makes you get salty?www.bbc.co.uk 본문 내용 중에서 중요하다고 생각 되는 부분을 설명해 보겠습니다.가장 먼저 Summary에 나오는 내용입니다.   (1) 의문사가 주어가 되는 경우도 있습니다. 보통 의문문은 "의문사 + 동사 + 주어" 형태입니다. 본문 아래에 다음과 같은 일반적인 형태의 의문문이 나옵니다.  보통 의문문은 위와 같은 구조입니다. 의문사가 나오고, 일반 의문문처럼 주어와 동사의 자리가 바뀐 형태인데, 의문사가 주어 역할을 하는 의문문도 있습니다.(2) upset이라는 단어가 반복적으로 나옵니다. salty 보다 upset이 더 많이 등장합니다. upset을 사전에서 찾아보면 다음과 같습니다.  동사로 쓰일 때는 목적어가 필요한 타동사로 쓰입니다. 보통 감정을 나타내는 동사들이 대부분 타동사입니다. 그러니 주어가 속상하다는 말이 아니라, 주어가 목적어를 속상하게 만들다는 의미라는 점 유의해야 합니다. 그리고 형용사로 쓰이면 주어가 속상하다는 말입니다. What upsets you? 이 예문에서는 주어(What)가 3인칭 단수라서 s를 붙혀 upsets라고 했습니다. 형태만 봐도 동사라는 것을 알 수 있죠? 그러니 "무엇이 당신을 속상하게 만드나?"라고 해석하면 됩니다. we get upset over ~ 이 때 upset은 형용사로 주어(we)가 속상한 것이구요."때때로 우리는 사소한 일로 속상해 한다."  (1) 지난 시간에도 나왔던 표현인데, 이런 표현은 그냥 숙어처럼 이해하는 것이 좋다고 생각합니다. 물론 이 표현이 분사구문이니 which가 앞에 나온 말을 받고 speak of~의 의미는...이런식으로 파고 들 수도 있습니다. 하지만 이런 표현은 (구어체에서) 자주 사용하는 관용적인 표현이고 분사구문이 반복되는 것을 줄인다는 의미도 있지만 의도적으로 표현을 모호하게 (두리뭉실하게) 할려면 생략하는 표현입니다. 그래서 이런 표현은 감각적으로 받아들이는 것이 좋습니다. 즉 문맥 속에서 자주 접하면서 이런 분위기일 때 사용하는 것이다고 이해하면 됩니다. 이 코너에서는 툭하면 나오는 표현입니다.(2) get + 형용사(upset), be + 형용사(upset) 이 2가지 패턴이 나옵니다. get은 상태의 변화, be는 상태 그대로를 말하는데 2 패턴을 섞어서 쓰는 것을 확인할 수 있습니다. "말이 나와서 그런데, 오늘 아침에 자판기에 너가 좋아하는 달달한 것이 없다고 정말 화 났더라!"  (1) 이런건 바로 구글링 해보면 됩니다.   명사는 구글링을 하면 이미지가 바로 나오니 더 기억하기 쉽습니다. 트러플은 보통 아주 비싼 버섯으로 알고 있는데, 여긴 달달한 것을 말하고 있으니 그림과 같은 쵸콜릿류 같네요. 유니콘 모양의 초코과자? (2) have no idea + "의문사로 시작하는 명사절"도 자주 쓰이는 패턴입니다. 특히 "you have no idea"라고 쓰면 상대방이 진짜로 모르는 것을 말하는 것은 아니겠죠. "얼마나 좋은지(혹은 나쁜지) 모를거야" 즉 좋다(혹은 나쁘다)는 것을 강조하기 위한 표현입니다. 그러니 이 표현은 통으로 기억하면 좋습니다.   페이페이가 salty라고 말했는데 로이는 sweaty로 들었습니다. 보통 관용적 - 사전적 의미 차이로 오해를 하는데, 이번 에피소드에서는 발음이 비슷해서 오해를 한 것으로 보입니다. "넌 오늘 아침에 너무 과민했어" "내가 땀을 흘렸다고? 난 스트레스를 받으면 땀을 흘려"  위 예문에서 salty의 의미는 아래쪽이 맞겠죠. 이 에피소드에서는 "중요한 일도 아닌데 화를 내는 것"을 salty하다고 설명하고 있습니다.  that이 형용사(desperate)를 수식하는 부사로도 쓰입니다.  사람을 바보로 만드는 장난이기에 꽤 짓궂은 장난입니다. 우리나라에서는 자칫 싸움날 수 있습니다. 미드 같은걸 보면 이런 장난에 상대적으로 관대한 듯 보입니다. 여기까지 설명을 가볍게 읽은 뒤 홈페이지에서 원문을 읽으면서 mp3 파일도 청취해 보시기 바랍니다.
